messages.subject: Travelin to LiveandLearn
messages.msgSnippet: AnneO writes:  We can wave from 33,000 feet! Dh Barry, dd13 Madelyn and I leave
messages.messageBody:
AnneO writes:
<<<<< It would be SO COOL to see others on the journey TO the
conference! >>>>>

We can wave from 33,000 feet!

Dh Barry, dd13 Madelyn and I leave Seattle on Wednesday "morning" at
12:14 and stumble into Boston at 10:20am. We'll detour to Lee, MA
to overnight with a cousin and then hit the hotel on Thursday
afternoon.

Kelly writes:
<<<<< My van's already a rolling advertisement for
unschooling; what's one more ad? <G> >>>>>>>>

Hope we see yours!!!!!

Mercedes
planning a sign to stick in the back window of the rental car. . . . .
